tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Observations (
    observation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    observer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    observation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    observation_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_species
        FOREIGN KEY (species_id)
        REFERENCES Species (species_id)
        ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE observations (
    observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    observation_date DATE,
    observer_name VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scientific_name VARCHAR(255),
  common_name VARCHAR(255),
  population_size INT,
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  habitat_type VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Observations (
  observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  observer_name VARCHAR(255),
  observation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationEfforts (
  effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  effort_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    population_size INT,
    geographic_range VARCHAR(100),
    conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL,
    habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
    climate VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE sightings (
    sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    sighting_date DATE,
    observer_name VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_species FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
    effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    species_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    effort_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_researcher FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_species FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);
